# mirascope.core.cohere.call_params

<Info title="Usage">

[Calls](/docs/mirascope/learn/calls#provider-specific-parameters)

## <ApiType type="Class" path="core/cohere/call_params" symbolName="CohereCallParams" /> CohereCallParams

The parameters to use when calling the Cohere API.
